titleStmt.title: The First part of the history of England extending to the conquest of so much of Britain as was subjected by the Romans : with an introductory preface to the whole / written in the year 1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J.C. and are to be sold by William Grantham ... Henry Brome ... Thomas Basset ... Robert Horne ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College, Cambridge, Library.
